_description: A morning prayer to God, Christ, the Virgin Mary, St. Michael, etc. — seven 6-line stanzas

BLSl3160.First Lines: Ihesu crist I the be-secheThow here my prayere…
BLSl3160.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 192-3.
